content: this pattern is also available for free on the clover blog 1 the double brim tunisian beanie is extra warm and cozy and with only one stitch and one decrease this pattern is super fun and quick to make change the hook size to easily change the size of this beanie perfect for cold winter days and nights us terminology **difficulty** easy **sizes** -toddler 17″-19″ circumference -child/teen 19″-21″ circumference -adult 21″-23″ circumference **materials** -clover interchangeable tunisian crochet hook with cord or 14 tunisian crochet hook baby/toddler size h 5 0 mm child/teen size i 5 5 mm adult size j 6 0 mm -dk weight yarn mandala sparkle 1 skein 100g/328yds/300m/94% acrylic 6% metallic polyester -darning needle -scissors -measuring tape gauge baby/toddler 16 sts & 16 row = 4 inches child/teen 14 sts & 15 row = 4 inches adult 13 sts & 14 row = 4 inches 1 https //blog clover-usa com/2022/02/25/double-brim-tunisian-beanie-tunisian-crochet-pattern/
